sentences.en: Cinderella's dress took the shine out of her sisters '.
sentences.cn: 灰姑娘的连衣裙使她姐姐们的服装黯然失色.

sentences.en: Dry curly hair naturally for maximum curl and shine.
sentences.cn: 让卷发自然变干，才能使头发卷最多，最有光泽。

sentences.en: I think I'll go and shine up the car a bit.
sentences.cn: 我想我得去把汽车擦亮点.

sentences.en: It is difficult to shine a light through its this thick mist.
sentences.cn: 光线很难穿透这么浓的雾.

sentences.en: Let him dust and shine the furniture.
sentences.cn: 让他给家具除尘并把它们擦亮。

sentences.en: One of the men shone a torch in his face.
sentences.cn: 其中一个男子用火把照着他的脸。

sentences.en: Seems to me you'vetaken quite a shine to Miss Richmond.
sentences.cn: 在我看来你对里士满小姐完全是一见钟情。

sentences.en: Shine the torch on so that we can read the labels.
sentences.cn: 用手电筒照这个标签,我们好看得见.

sentences.en: Shine the torch on the lock while I try to get the key in.
sentences.cn: 我插钥匙时，请用手电筒照着锁头。

sentences.en: The boss took a shine to the new girl.
sentences.cn: 老板喜欢上了新来的姑娘.

sentences.en: The container is invisible until you shine an ultraviolet light on it.
sentences.cn: 那个柜子只有用紫外线照射才可以看见。

sentences.en: The moon shone brightly in the sky.
The rain will take the shine off my boots.
sentences.cn: 这场雨会使我的靴子失去光泽.

sentences.en: The windows gleamed gold in the shine of the setting sun.
sentences.cn: 窗子在落日的余晖中金光闪闪.

sentences.en: The wood had been recently polished to bring back the shine.
sentences.cn: 木头最近经过抛光又恢复了光泽。

sentences.en: these concerns are taking the shine off Britain's economic recovery.
sentences.cn: 这些忧虑使英国经济恢复黯淡起来。

sentences.en: This gel gives a beautiful shine to the hair.
sentences.cn: 这种发胶会使头发看上去有亮丽的光泽。

words.tran_cn: 有光泽的，擦亮的；闪耀的；晴朗的；磨损的
发光体；金钱；杰出的人物；黑眼圈

phrases.tran_cn: [俚语]竭力讨好某人，巴结某人

phrases.phrase: take a shine to【非正式用语】

phrases.tran_cn: 使黯然失色；使失去兴奋

trans.tran_en: the brightness that something has when light shines on it

trans.tran_cn: 发光，照耀，把…照向，擦亮，出类拔萃
